context: By 2020, the customer engagement platform market had matured significantly with a diverse competitive landscape. Braze faced competition from both established enterprise players (Salesforce, Adobe) and emerging specialized platforms (CleverTap, MoEngage). The market was characterized by a shift toward AI-driven personalization, real-time analytics, and omnichannel capabilities. Businesses were increasingly seeking alternatives to Braze due to its high subscription costs and interface complexity.
